new_version.description: New version available! Reload to receive the latest functionality.

no_data.description: There is currently no data to display.
no_data.title: No data

no_results.description: There are no results matching your search criteria.
no_results.title: No results

unsaved_changes_dialog.description: All unsaved changes will be lost. Are you sure you want to continue?
unsaved_changes_dialog.title: Unsaved changes

bad_request.description: Something went wrong. Please try again.
bad_request.title: Bad request

forbidden.description: You don't have permission to access this resource.
forbidden.title: Forbidden

invalid_form_input.description: Please check the highlighted fields and try again.
invalid_form_input.title: Invalid form

resource_not_found.description: The requested resource could not be found.
resource_not_found.title: Resource not found

unauthorized.description: You are not authorized to access this resource.
unauthorized.title: Unauthorized

validation_error.description: Please check the form for errors.
validation_error.title: Validation error

login.description: Sign in to your account to continue
login.error: Something went wrong while logging in. Please try again.
login.title: Sign in

interface_theme.description: Select or customize your UI theme.
interface_theme.title: Interface theme

high_contrast.title: High contrast mode
high_contrast.description: Enhance readability and visibility by increasing the contrast between UI elements.

keyboard_shortcuts.title: Keyboard shortcut hints
keyboard_shortcuts.description: Keyboard shortcuts are always enabled, but you can choose whether to display a hint.

reduce_motion.description: Reduce the amount and intensity of animations, hover effects and other moving effects across the application.
reduce_motion.title: Reduce motion

enabled.label: Enabled
enabled.description: You will see fewer animations and hover effects to reduce motion.

disabled.label: Disabled
disabled.description: All animations and hover effects are enabled for a full experience.

name.description: First and last name of the user.

validation.too_big: Must be less than or equal to {count}
validation.too_big_array: Must contain a most {count} item | Must contain a most {count} items
validation.too_big_number: Must be less than or equal to {count}
validation.too_big_string: Must be at most {count} character | Must be at most {count} characters
validation.too_small: Must be greater than or equal to {count}
validation.too_small_array: Must contain at least {count} item | Must contain at least {count} items
validation.too_small_number: Must be greater than or equal to {count}
validation.too_small_string: Must be at least {count} character | Must be at least {count} characters
